job_description:
Senior Backend .Net Developer+ Strong Azure

Project until March 2024

HYBRID in Rexdale, Ontario

7 years of prior .NET development experience required
Experience developing and deploying applications on Azure, in particular

oAzure App Services, Azure Functions

oAzure Container Instances and Azure Kubernetes

oAzure API Management

oAzure databases

oUser authentication

oApplication and network security

Languages and development environments preferences:

oC# and .Net, JavaScript, Python

oVisual Studio and Visual Studio Code

Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework, SQL Server and design/architectural patterns
Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (REST, RPC)
Understanding of Agile methodologies
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
Bachelor degree specializing in computer science

Thanks,

Neera

TES-The Employment Solution
